about_the_game:
Game type: This is a sci-fi and theological FPS multiplayer shooting game;
Game theme: Tell the story of humanity discovering the truth about the operation of the universe in the future and achieving the evolution of human bones and machinery. With the peaceful development of humanity in the future and the entry into the era of technological trends, one day a huge petrified head resembling humans but not humans fell from the sky. Scientists used advanced AI neural network technology to connect and read the petrified head to obtain the shocking truth of the universe. At this time, unknown creatures with evolved exoskeletons and massive bronze giants invaded Earth and attacked humans. In order to resist, humans used the information obtained from the petrified stone to create five sets of evolved skeletal armor for humans, code named Kirin, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Green Dragon, and Xuanwu
Game modes: PVE mode (this mode can be used for gun shooting battles and summoning flying shuttle boat battles, PVE has a corresponding upgrade system, killing monsters to obtain upgrade crystals, and can evolve the attributes of players' armor skeletons), PVP mode (this mode can be used for gun shooting battles, PVP can be divided into team competition mode and individual competition mode).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
